name: bandeau
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a strip of cloth worn around the head to hold the hair back from the face: She put a red velvet bandeau in her hair. He has shoulder-length hair and wears a bandeau.
a style of top (= a piece of clothing for the upper part of the body) consisting of a strip of material that fits around the chest, with no straps or sleeves: They wear little bandeaux under bolero jackets, with bare midriffs. a bandeau top/bikini See also
bandeau dress
More examplesFewer examplesShe loosened her long hair from its silk bandeau and shook it free.A bandeau under a jacket will make a traditional suit more contemporary.There were lots of crop tops and bandeaus.She dressed in low-slung trousers and a sparkly bandeau top.The dancers were clad in black bandeau bikinis.
